content: round 220-224-236 weave in all ends place the dress in lukewarm water 252-260-276 292-312-344 sts and let soak thoroughly gently squeeze out the next round k to end excess water and place the dress on a towel roll in to remove further moisture repeat the last round until the piece measures 15 / 38 cm from the underarm lay flat pin to measurements and let dry take care when measuring the hem as it will easily stretch being heavy when wet hem techniques change to us 1½ 2 5 mm needles and knit two rounds shadow wraps 1st round rs k to end 2nd round k to end work to where you want to turn the short row knit 3rd round k2 k2tog 2yo to end into the mother stitch one row below the next stitch 4th round k4 drop the other yo to end slip the stitch onto the left needle creating a double 5th round k to end stitch turn to work ws the next time you come the 6th round p to end double stitch knit it together to close the short row gap repeat rounds 5-6 until the garter stitch measures 0 75 / 2 cm bind off sts sleeves change to us 2½ 3 0 mm needles and place the sleeve sts back onto the needle setup row rs starting at the center of the underarm pick up and knit 2-2-3 3-3-3 4-6-6 sts k the 70-72-72 80-80-84 90-92-96 sleeve sts pick up and knit 2-2-3 3-3-3 4-6-6 sts from the underarm pm and join in the round 74-76-78 86-86-90 98- 104-108 sts next round rs k to end repeat the last round 6-6-4 4-4-4 4-2-2 more times decrease round rs k1 k2tog k to last 3 sts ssk k1 repeat the decreases every 8th-8th-6th 6th-6th-6th 4th- 4th-4th round 10-11-12 14-14-16 18-19-21 more times 52-52-52 56-56-56 60-64-64 sts copyright @ anna johanna 2018 all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only 4 pattern support pm annaj0hanna on ravelry neulisti mnk@gmail com
